Plot: Marty discovers that Edna has burned down Hill Valley as a result of his actions in 1931. Doc and Marty must prevent Edna from doing whatever she did that resulted in Hill Valley getting destroyed.
Title: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 5, Outatime
Writer: Robert Zemeckis (characters), Bob Gale (characters), Bob Gale (story), Andy Hartzell
Actors: A.J. LoCascio, Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, James Arnold Taylor
